data.name: Brothers
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

“The kind of behavior exhibited by the drill sergeant would result in adverse legal actions taken against him… Because this script deviates fairly widely from reality we will not be able to support the filming on an Army installation.” - Lt. Colonel. That’s what the US army thought of my script. I remember the smile on my face. I was an athlete used to hours of extreme exercise, and I thought the military was going to be easy. But after the first day I didn’t smile anymore. I was used to exercises that build you up; In the military all they did was break you down. You work out for days, you get bullied, and you don’t get to stop when you’re tired and pissed off. You just keep going. Stories of revenge were gladly shared, we held on to anything that made us feel free again. But there was one story that I will never forget. A rebellion so insane that it simply couldn’t be true; this is what I decided to base my short film on. I’m Swedish so my military experience was different, but If the US military doesn’t want to support it I must have done something right. This is my revenge story. Adam Stumle Writer & Director

data.short_description: Fresh off the bus, a struggling squad of recruits band together to battle the bone-crushing demands of their maniacal Drill Sergeant.

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core 2 もしくは同等のAMD 製CPU
  • メモリー: 1 GB RAM
  • ネットワーク: ブロードバンドインターネット接続
  • ストレージ: 200 MB 利用可能
  • 追記事項: 360p での表示は3Mbps 、540p での表示は5Mbps のネットワーク帯域幅。
pc_requirements.recommended:
推奨:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • プロセッサー: HD 1080p の再生には Intel Core I3 以上 、同等の AMD 製 CPU を推奨します
  • メモリー: 2 GB RAM
  • ネットワーク: ブロードバンドインターネット接続
  • ストレージ: 500 MB 利用可能
  • 追記事項: 720p での表示は8Mbps 、1080p での表示は12Mbps のネットワーク帯域幅。
